vision.title: Precise Color, New Standard
vision.subTitle: We create a clearer world with precise color

description1.title: Precision
description1.description: We provide a reliable 'true color' through AI-based high-precision measurement for everyone.

description2.title: Global Standard
description2.description:
Precise color is a new language that transcends borders.
We create a global standard that all industries can share.

technologyImpact.title: The Standard of Innovation that Creates Precise Color
technologyImpact.description:
With AI-based high-precision color measurement technology and proprietary patents,
we are solving problems in the dental industry and expanding globally.
Our technology goes beyond simple analysis to create a new standard for the industry.

news.description: Check out the latest news and events from Additional Doctor.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Join us and create a brighter future together.
